Plot  

Beethoven and Achioo are ordered to investigate Ha, a smuggler and drug dealer. They know that all details of his activities are in a book that he has given to his mistress. With help from an informant, they locate the mistress who is dead. Fortunately, a mysterious woman shows up and helps the duo solve the case. (Universe)
